concepts.name: Square Root Functions
concepts.description: Exploring square root functions, their domains, ranges, and graphing characteristics.

concepts.name: Shifting and Stretching Graphs
concepts.description: Techniques for shifting and stretching square root function graphs vertically, horizontally, and proportionally.

concepts.name: Radical Expressions
concepts.description: Understanding and simplifying radical expressions, including product and quotient properties of radicals.

concepts.name: Solving Radical Equations
concepts.description: Techniques for solving equations involving radicals, including identifying extraneous solutions.

concepts.name: Real-World Applications of Radicals
concepts.description: Applying radical expressions and equations to problems in geometry, physics, and other real-world scenarios.

concepts.name: Pythagorean Theorem
concepts.description: Using the Pythagorean theorem and its converse to solve problems involving right triangles and distances.

concepts.name: Distance Formula
concepts.description: Deriving and using the formula to calculate the distance between two points in the coordinate plane.

concepts.name: Midpoint Formula
concepts.description: Calculating the midpoint of a line segment using the average of its endpoints' coordinates.

concepts.name: Measures of Central Tendency
concepts.description: Exploring mean, median, and mode as tools for summarizing data sets.

concepts.name: Measures of Dispersion
concepts.description: Using range, variance, and standard deviation to describe the spread of data in a set.

concepts.name: Histograms and Data Visualization
concepts.description: Creating and interpreting stem-and-leaf plots and histograms to analyze data distributions.

concepts.name: Real-World Statistics Applications
concepts.description: Applying statistical methods to analyze and interpret real-world data in various contexts.

concepts.name: Graphing Calculators for Data
concepts.description: Using graphing calculators to create histograms and analyze statistical data efficiently.
